newsitem.title: USA: Movie Gallery in litigation over merger.
newsitem.headline: Movie Gallery in litigation over merger.

text.p: Movie Gallery Inc said on Thursday that it and certain former shareholders of Home Vision Entertainment Inc have filed lawsuits against each other, with each side claiming breach of contract.
The alleged breaches of contract relate to a merger of Movie Gallery and Home Vision in July 1996.

The former Home Vision shareholders are seeking damages of $7.5 million in its lawsuit filed in U.S. District Court for the District of Maine, Movie Gallery said in a statement. Movie Gallery said their suit is without merit and it intends to defend itself against the claims.
Movie Gallery said that, in its lawsuit filed in the Circuit Court of Houston County, Alabama, it seeks compensatory and punitive damages
Movie Gallery was not immediately available for comment, and the identities of the shareholders were not immediately available.
